scripts.setup:examples: yarn setup:pages && yarn setup:comics && yarn setup:images && yarn setup:data
scripts.cleanup:examples: yarn cleanup:pages && yarn cleanup:comics && yarn cleanup:images && yarn cleanup:data
scripts.cleanup:comics: shx rm -f src/pages/comic/finale.md && shx rm -f src/pages/comic/what-is-this.md && shx rm -f src/pages/comic/why-use-this.md
scripts.cleanup:images: shx rm -f public/assets/images/comics/finale.png && shx rm -f public/assets/images/comics/what-is-this.png && shx rm -f public/assets/images/comics/why-use-this.png && shx rm -f public/assets/images/hellebore-logo.png
